name: RPA.Images
doc:
DEPRECATED Use library RPA.Desktop or RPA.Recognition from package rpaframework-recognition instead

Library for taking screenshots, matching templates, and manipulating images.

keywords.name: Crop Image
keywords.doc:
Crop an existing image.

param image:Image to crop
param region:Region to crop image to
param filename:Save cropped image to filename

keywords.name: Find Template In Image
keywords.doc:
DEPRECATED Use keyword Find from library RPA.Recognition instead Attempt to find the template from the given image.

param image:Path to image or Image instance, used to search from
param template:Path to image or Image instance, used to search with
param limit:Limit returned results to maximum of limit.
param region:Area to search from. Can speed up search significantly.
param tolerance:
 Tolerance for matching, value between 0.1 and 1.0
return:List of matching regions
raises ImageNotFoundError:
 No match was found
keywords.shortdoc: *DEPRECATED* Use keyword `Find` from library `RPA.Recognition` instead Attempt to find the template from the given image.

keywords.name: Find Template On Screen
keywords.doc: DEPRECATED!! use RPA.Desktop.Find Element instead Attempt to find the template image from the current desktop. For argument descriptions, see find_template_in_image()
keywords.shortdoc: *DEPRECATED!!* use `RPA.Desktop.Find Element` instead Attempt to find the template image from the current desktop. For argument descriptions, see ``find_template_in_image()``

keywords.name: Get Pixel Color In Image
keywords.doc:
Get the RGB value of a pixel in the image.

param image:image to get pixel from
param point:coordinates for pixel or Point object
keywords.shortdoc: Get the RGB value of a pixel in the image.

keywords.name: Get Pixel Color On Screen
keywords.doc:
Get the RGB value of a pixel currently on screen.

param point:coordinates for pixel or Point object
keywords.shortdoc: Get the RGB value of a pixel currently on screen.

keywords.name: Show Region In Image
keywords.doc:
Draw a rectangle onto the image around the given region.

param image:image to draw onto
param region:coordinates for region or Region object
param color:color of rectangle
param width:line width of rectangle
keywords.shortdoc: Draw a rectangle onto the image around the given region.

keywords.name: Show Region On Screen
keywords.doc:
Draw a rectangle around the given region on the current desktop.

param region:coordinates for region or Region object
param color:color of rectangle
param width:line width of rectangle
keywords.shortdoc: Draw a rectangle around the given region on the current desktop.

keywords.name: Take Screenshot
keywords.doc:
DEPRECATED Use keyword RPA.Desktop.Take Screenshot instead Take a screenshot of the current desktop.

param filename:Save screenshot to filename
param region:Region to crop screenshot to
keywords.shortdoc: *DEPRECATED* Use keyword `RPA.Desktop.Take Screenshot` instead Take a screenshot of the current desktop.

keywords.name: Wait Template On Screen
keywords.doc:
DEPRECATED!! use RPA.Desktop.Wait For Element instead Wait for template image to appear on current desktop. For further argument descriptions, see find_template_in_image()

param timeout:Time to wait for template (in seconds)
keywords.shortdoc: *DEPRECATED!!* use `RPA.Desktop.Wait For Element` instead Wait for template image to appear on current desktop. For further argument descriptions, see ``find_template_in_image()``
